channel.title: Quietus/Videostore Sale (and Giveaway)
channel.description:
@SinisterBeard is having a sale on Quietus and Videostore. [http://quietus.co.uk](http://quietus.co.uk/) https://itch.io/s/29021/my-wife-lost-her-job-sale[ …](https://t.co/i151WWmyYb) https://www.drivethrurpg.com/browse/pub/12431/Sinister-Beard-Games
If you don't have it, I will buy the first four people who message me a copy of Quietus or Video Store in pdf on DTRPG.

item.title: Quietus/Videostore Sale (and Giveaway)
item.dc:creator: @Kerstrom
item.description:
@Kerstrom wrote:

I don’t have either of these games, but just noticed that Quietus was on sale on drivethru, when I recommended it on reddit for someone looking for a slasher flick kind of game. Hopefully, some one has taken you up on the offer of some great looking games.

Cheers for looking out for others.

Read full topic
